Description: The Quarterly Mental Health Community Teams Activity return collects data on the number of patients on Care Programme Approach (CPA) followed up within 7 days of discharge from psychiatric inpatient care, and the number of inpatient admissions gate kept by Crisis Resolution Home Treatment (CRHT) teams.
Name: Mental Health Community Teams Activity
Notes: The data is available as a XLS for the time series and both CSV and XLS for the data produced Quarterly
Route from landing page to data: Data can be located on the landing page by scrolling down to data  the England Time-Series is available in XLS  and the quarterly data sets are available under the current year 2019 - 20 are available in  both CSV and XLS  formats.
Sizing Notes: Simple table format with simple dimensions. May be better suited to the mental health family.
